VST transforms counts across search terms. Samples are labelled by subtype, timepoint, and
condition.  

* TDNV = Nociceptors   
* CGRT = Peptidergic nociceptors
* MRTD = Non-peptidergic nociceptors  
* CRTH = C-LTMRs
* TBAC = Ad- AB-RA-LTMRs

---

* i = ipsilateral
* c = contralateral

---

* 3D = 3 days post-SNI
* 4W = 4 weeks post-SNI
